name: STOCK BALANCE AS PER WAREHOUSE CIRCLE STORE ( INHOUSE ) - E21
query:
select
s.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:150",
i.item_name as "Item Name::200",
i.stock_uom as "Stock UOM::100",
i.brand "Brand::100",
(IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = s.item_code and sli.warehouse = s.warehouse and sli.actual_qty < 0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1 and sli.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and sli.posting_date <= %(to_date)s and sli.warehouse = %(warehouse)s and sli.company = %(company)s group by sli.item_code),0))-(IFNULL((select sum(sli.actual_qty) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = s.item_code and sli.warehouse = s.warehouse and sli.actual_qty > 0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1 and sli.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and sli.posting_date <= %(to_date)s and sli.warehouse = %(warehouse)s and sli.company = %(company)s group by sli.item_code),0))+(IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sli where sli.item_code = s.item_code and sli.warehouse= s.warehouse and sli.is_cancelled != 1 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)) as "Opening Qty::100",
IFNULL((select sum(sli.actual_qty) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = s.item_code and sli.warehouse = s.warehouse and sli.actual_qty > 0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1 and sli.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and sli.posting_date <= %(to_date)s and sli.warehouse = %(warehouse)s and sli.company = %(company)s group by sli.item_code),0) as " In Qty::100",
IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = s.item_code and sli.warehouse = s.warehouse and sli.actual_qty < 0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1 and sli.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and sli.posting_date <= %(to_date)s and sli.warehouse = %(warehouse)s and sli.company = %(company)s group by sli.item_code),0) as " Out Qty::100",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sli where sli.item_code = s.item_code and sli.warehouse= s.warehouse and sli.is_cancelled != 1 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Balance Qty::100"
from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as s left join `tabItem` as i
on s.item_code = i.name 
where s.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and s.posting_date <= %(to_date)s and s.warehouse = %(warehouse)s and s.company = %(company)s and ((IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = s.item_code and sli.warehouse = s.warehouse and sli.actual_qty < 0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1 and sli.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and sli.posting_date <= %(to_date)s and sli.warehouse = %(warehouse)s and sli.company = %(company)s group by sli.item_code),0))-(IFNULL((select sum(sli.actual_qty) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = s.item_code and sli.warehouse = s.warehouse and sli.actual_qty > 0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1 and sli.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and sli.posting_date <= %(to_date)s and sli.warehouse = %(warehouse)s and sli.company = %(company)s group by sli.item_code),0))+(IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sli where sli.item_code = s.item_code and sli.warehouse= s.warehouse and sli.is_cancelled != 1 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)) or IFNULL((select ABS(sum(sli.actual_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = s.item_code and sli.warehouse = s.warehouse and sli.actual_qty < 0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1 and sli.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and sli.posting_date <= %(to_date)s and sli.warehouse = %(warehouse)s and sli.company = %(company)s group by sli.item_code),0) or IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sli where sli.item_code = s.item_code and sli.warehouse= s.warehouse and sli.is_cancelled != 1 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)) !=0 group by s.item_code
report_name: STOCK BALANCE AS PER WAREHOUSE CIRCLE STORE ( INHOUSE ) - E21
